text: Magar unhon ne kaha â€œAey hamare Rubb, hamare safar ki musafatein lambi karde.â€ Unhon ne apne upar aap zulm kiya, aakhir e kaar humne unhein afsana bana kar rakh diya aur unhein bilkul tittar bittar kar daala. Yaqeenan ismein nishaniyan hain har us shaks ke liye jo bada saabir(steadfast) o shakir (thankful) ho
